Collect 3 points with this purchase Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) Sanex Natur Protect Invisible Fresh Natural Bamboo Roll On Deodorant 50ml Stay fresh and odour protected for 48-hours with Sanex Natur Protect Invisible Fresh with Natural Bamboo Roll On Deodorant. With a natural, vegan formula, this roll on deodorant contains 0% aluminium salts, 0% ethyl alcohol and is dermatologically tested. Anti-white marks and yellow stains.. How to use Ensure underarms are dry before applying. Apply the roller ball in circular motions, checking coverage is even on both underarms. Allow product to dry before dressing. Hazards and Cautions Caution: Stop use if irritation occurs.
